message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really like it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I can do $110, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that.
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $95. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I'm still willing to work with you, Bob. I can meet you halfway at $105, but I think we can do better than that. Let's see if we can meet in the middle again.
I appreciate your willingness to work with me, but I was thinking more along the lines of $98. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I think we're getting close, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession. I can meet you at $105, but I'm not going to go any higher than that. Let's finalize the deal.
